title: Real Results
description: See how I help businesses simplify processes, increase productivity, and achieve their goals through custom, intelligent solutions.

prospectingLeads.title: Automated Prospecting
prospectingLeads.alt: Automation flow for Google Maps prospecting in n8n
prospectingLeads.description: I implemented an n8n automation that automatically extracts and organizes leads from Google Maps, saving hours of manual work and generating lists ready for the sales team.

automatedDiagnosis.title: AI-Powered Automated Diagnosis
automatedDiagnosis.alt: Maestro and AI Agents flow in n8n
automatedDiagnosis.description: An end-to-end AI system that analyzes a form, generates a complete technical PDF diagnosis (Context, Insights, Conclusion) using OpenAI agents, and emails it to the lead, qualifying them in minutes.
